QuestData.Title: This Thing of Ours
QuestData.Description:
Au'narim is the top broker here. She keeps this place supplied with exotic creatures for us to fight in the arena.
She's noticed your efforts and wants to meet you!
This is important. A broker's backing could lead to an invitation to compete!
QuestData.RewardText: You must be one of these outsiders I hear so much about.
